# AliceToolsAinEdit.Source property

If [`SourceType`](SourceType.md) is UpdatesAinVersion, this value should be a numeric string betweens 4-12;

Otherwrise, this value is regarded as the path of source code.

```csharp
public string Source { get; set; }
```
